Label.en: It had women make up over 50% of its workforce... very unusual for the time!
Label.fr: It had women make up over 50% of its workforce... very unusual for the time!
Label.es: It had women make up over 50% of its workforce... very unusual for the time!
Label.zh: It had women make up over 50% of its workforce... very unusual for the time!

Label.en: And the company even provided dormitories for unmarried women to live in, right above the store!
Label.fr: And the company even provided dormitories for unmarried women to live in, right above the store!
Label.es: And the company even provided dormitories for unmarried women to live in, right above the store!
Label.zh: And the company even provided dormitories for unmarried women to live in, right above the store!

Label.en: Right! It might seem a bit dystopian now... but at the time, it was a huge step forward!

Label.es: Right! It might seem a bit dystopian now... but at the time, it was a huge step forward!
